sentences.en: A gale has risen and is sweeping the clouds across the sky.
A gale was blowing and the sea was choppy.
sentences.cn: 狂风大作，海面上波浪起伏。

sentences.en: According to the weather forecast, there will be a gale tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 据气象台预报, 明天有大风.

sentences.en: Gale winds came on top of the floods.
Hundreds of trees were blown down in the gale.
sentences.cn: 几百棵大树被狂风刮倒了.

sentences.en: In a severe gale the ship split in two.
sentences.cn: 在一次大风中，船断成了两截。

sentences.en: It sank in a howling gale.
sentences.cn: 它在呼啸的狂风中沉没了。

sentences.en: Sometimes happiness is just a matter of attitude adjustment.--Susan Gale
sentences.cn: 有时候，幸福只需转变一下自己的态度。

sentences.en: The gale blew down hundreds of trees.
The gale screamed through the harbor.
The house crumpled up in the gale.
The ship met with a gale.
The wind was still rising, approach-ing a force nine gale.
sentences.cn: 风力仍在增强，接近9级大风。

sentences.en: We got our roof blown off in the gale last night.
sentences.cn: 昨夜的大风把我们的房顶给掀掉了.

trans.tran_cn: 大风，暴风，（突发的）一阵，<诗>微风，[植]香杨梅
